meta.name: note
meta.content: Not clear what the edition was

chapter.name: August 1: Procession of the Precious Wood of the Cross & Commemoration of the 7 Holy Maccabee Children
August 1: Feast of the Most-Merciful Savior & the All-Holy Theotokos
August 2: Transfer of the Relics of the Holy Protomartyr and Archdeacon Stephen
August 3: Sts. Isaacius, Dalmatus & Faustus
August 3: St. Anthony the Roman
August 4: Seven Holy Youths of Ephesus
August 5: Forefeast of the Transfiguration & Holy Martyr Eusygnius
August 6: Holy Transfiguration of Our Lord
August 7: Holy Martyred Monk Dometius
August 8: St. Emilian the Confessor, Bishop of Cyzicus
August 8: Transfer of the Relics of Sts. Zosimas & Sabbatius of Solovki
August 9: Holy Apostle Matthias
August 10: Holy Martyr & Archdeacon Laurence
August 11: Holy Martyr & Archdeacon Euplus
August 12: Martyrs Photius & Anicetas and St. Maximus the Confessor
August 13: Leave-taking of the Feast of the Transfiguration of the Lord
August 13: St. Tikhon, Bishop of Voronezh
August 14: Forefeast of the Dormition and Holy Prophet Micah
August 15: Dormition of the Most-Holy Theotokos
August 16: Transfer of the Image Not-Made-By-Hands of Our Lord from Edessa to Constantinople
August 16: All-Night Vigil for the Transfer of the Image Not-Made-By-Hands
August 17: Holy Martyr Myron
August 18: Holy Martyrs Florus & Laurus
August 19: Holy Martyr Andrew the General
August 20: Holy Prophet Samuel
August 21: Holy Apostle Thaddaeus & Holy Martyr Bassa & Those with Her
August 22: Holy Martyr Agathonicus & Those with Him and Holy Martyr Luppus
August 23: Leave-taking of the Dormition of the All-holy Theotokos
August 24: Hieromartyr Eutyches
August 24: Holy New-hieromartyr Maximus Sandovich, Protomartyr of the Lemko People
August 25: Return of the Relics of the Holy Apostle Bartholomew & Holy Apostle Titus
August 26: Holy Martyrs Adrian and Natalia
August 26: Meeting of the Vladimir Icon of the Theotokos
August 27: St. Poemen the Great
August 28: St. Moses the Black
August 28: Commemoratin of the Holy Fathers of the Kiev Far Caves
August 29: Beheading of St. John the Forerunner and Baptist
August 30: Holy Fathers Alexander, John and Paul the New, Patriarchs of Constantinople
August 30: Transfer of the Relics of St. Alexander Nevsky
August 31: Deposition of the Precious Cincture of the Theotokos
August 31: Our Father among the Saints Aidan, Bishop of Lindisfarne, Enlightener of Northumbria
